coreframe.io.fileserver.remote
Class MultiRemoteFile

java.lang.Object
  coreframe.io.fileserver.remote.MultiRemoteFile
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileHandler, RemoteFileHandler, java.io.Serializable
public class MultiRemoteFile
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, RemoteFileHandler, FileHandler

RemoteFileServer 와 연결되는 Client측 File Handler 이다.

Version:
1.0
Author:
김성권, Sungkwon Kim,sysop@n-shock.org
See Also:
Serialized Form
